body.p: Sir -- I am directed by his Honor the Mayor to inform you that he has recieved your letter in relation to the confinement of Mr Hugh Shannon, in our City Work House -- In reply I am directed to state to your excellency that Mr Shannon, returned to this place a few weeks since having your remission for a fine inflicted some six or seven months since -- Of course Your remission was respected but Mr Shannon, was tried ^again^ for a violation of a City Ordinance in escaping from the work House and fined Ten dollars -- Mayor Wingate, requests me to state to Your Excellency that he will discharge him immediately and give him another chance --

I have the honor to be Your Obt Srt
Chas H Wickliffe
Dep

Lexington City Ct
$10 } Misdemeanor
Hugh Shannon
Iss July 20. 1863
The fine in this case Remitted
